ðŸ“– Summary: SpotiFLAC is a desktop application that allows users to download Spotify tracks in high-quality FLAC format. It sources audio from alternative streaming services like Tidal, Qobuz, and Amazon Music without requiring any user accounts or authentication with Spotify.
